metadata.title: CVE-2020-28243 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in SaltStack Salt before 3002.5. The minion's restartcheck is vulnerable to command injection via a crafted process name. This allows for a local privilege escalation by any user able to create a files on the minion in a non-blacklisted directory.

criterions.comment: salt package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
